channel.title: What should i base a forum on?
channel.description:
greetings all ;) :D :cool: :rolleyes:
heaps of people are making new forums about runescape etc.. and only end up with about 5 members :|so i was wonderng, what do you guys think i should base my forum on? ps: sorry if this is the wrong section for this ;)

item.title: What should i base a forum on?
item.dc:creator: @powerade powerade
item.description:
@powerade wrote:

[quote=“yuhaiyang1, post:1, topic:3070”]greetings all :rolleyes:

heaps of people are making new forums about runescape etc… and only end up with about 5 members :|so i was wonderng, what do you guys think i should base my forum on? ps: sorry if this is the wrong section for this ;)[/quote]
Make it about pking etc peaople likes it
O and yes put some pking vids too

item.title: What should i base a forum on?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

As i said in another thread once:

The people who run successful forums:

-Experienced in running a website
-Have decent hosting and a domain(No free crap!)
-Offer something other forums don’t, such as a runescape bot that you have made. These forums have Moparscape, which is pretty famous now.
-And even then, they still have a slim chance of being successful.

Read full topic
item.source: What should i base a forum on?

item.title: What should i base a forum on?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

inferno:

Don’t bother making one. As you said, heaps of people are making them and only end up with about 5 members. Why? Because everyone has already joined the main ones like this one and there is no need for more at the moment.

yeah that’s why my forums has over 1000 members and i’m not even a community member lol, and base your forum on your server and make a really good server lolololololol that’s what i did XD or you could make a forum for everyone lfmao hahahaha but up to your really so ya

Read full topic
